full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Sit-Stand Desks
### Tender Details
| **Details** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Title (English) | Sit-Stand Desks |
| Title (French) | Bureau Autoportant Réglable en Hauteur |
| Reference Number | CB-452-79263872 |
| Amendment Number | 5 |
| Solicitation Number | PR142226 |
| Publication Date | January 17, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | January 26, 2024 (14:00:00) |
| Amendment Date | January, 26 2024 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | January 30, 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2024 |

### Notice Summary
This Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) is issued pursuant to Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. The procurement covers a requirement for office furniture, specifically sit-stand desks to be delivered to Montreal, Quebec, by March 31, 2024.

This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Rationale
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires the procurement of office furniture, including sit-stand desks, to support the needs of employees in Montreal, Quebec.

### Preference and Evaluation Criteria
The procurement will be conducted using a Selective Tendering method. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest evaluated price.

### Notice Type
This NPP follows the Treasury Board Contracting Policy and includes accessibility criteria in the requirements for goods and services.

### Supplier Eligibility
Suppliers must be registered in PWGSC's Supply Arrangement # E60PQ-140003/C to be eligible to participate in this procurement.

### Interested Parties
Interested parties may obtain more information from the contracting authority by contacting:

* Name: Sophia Kuca
* Contact Information: sophia.kuca@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca (Phone: [343] 551-6913)

### Reference Documents
The following documents are available at the Government of Canada procurement portal:

* NPP Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29429/pr142226_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29429/pr142226_npp.pdf)
* Amendment Document:
